name: Scribbrawl: Cutthroat Conservation
description:
Scribbles are threatening the existence of famous paintings! As a conservator, it's your job to restore them to their original form and protect them. Armed with your cotton swab and solvents, you're the perfect one for the job.

Development on Scribbrawl lasted for 2 weeks as part of a rapid prototype in the month of September 2021. Made in Unity and inspired by the fine arts.

Development Team:
Audrey Luce - Project Manager, Level Designer
Annie Gustafson - Programmer
Dylan Micheli - Tech Designer, Programmer
Cameron Friday - Artist
